verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
At the end of the day
God, You always stay the same, Yeah
And even when things fade away
You’re forever Ancient of days, Yeah
Lord You are higher than the highest
Lord You are greater than the greatest
Lord You are bigger than the biggest
Lord You are brighter than the brightest

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jehovah…
Idi Ebube (You are so great), Idi Ebube
Jehovah
Nara Ekele, Nara Ekele (We give You the praise)

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Lord I declare that You are Alpha and Omega
Yes You are…oh yes You are…

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
This is the season of Jubilee
Singing and dancing for you and me
Thanking and praising because we're free
Oh this is the year of Jubilee

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
This is the season of Jubilee
Singing and dancing for you and me
Thanking and praising because we're free
Oh this is the year of Jubilee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Put your hands together
Everybody praise the Lord
Put your hands together
Sing and dance and praise the Lord

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Everything that was stolen shall be returned unto me
Mother father sister brother they will all go free
Everything that was stolen shall be returned unto me
Singing dancing praising shouting increase and victory

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Everything that was stolen shall be returned unto me
Mother father sister brother they will all go free
Everything that was stolen shall be returned unto me
Singing dancing praising shouting increase and victory

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Everybody shout hallelu
(Hallelujah)
Children of God will you shout hallelujah

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Shout hallelujah to the king of kings
(Hallelujah)
Shout hallelujah to the Lord of Lord's
(Hallelujah)

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Children of God will you shout hallelujah.
(Yes)
Shout Halleluyah to the Lord 7times
(Hallelujah...)

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
for the things you do
for my life you change
for your mercy and glory
For your blessings today

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Jehovah you do me well o
(You do me well )
Jehovah you do me well o
(You do me well )
God of settlement settle me well o ah ah
(He settle well)

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
The way you dey do me
E dey sweet my belle
The way you dey bless me
E dey make me happy
